entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UNL_MC_MONOLITH
entry.description: cID for monolithic elements on the Mission Computer, which don't have their own cID. Most obviously, the parameter server uses this cID, so all elements using the parameter server should use this cID.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UNL_MC_CORE
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'cored' module, which monitors the health of other components and emits a heartbeat for the overall system.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UNL_MC_LOG
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'logd' module, which simply provides logging of all MAVlink messages.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UNL_MC_VIDEO
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'videod' module, which manages capture and streaming of imagery.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_LCM_BRIDGE
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_lcmd' module, which governs the link between internal and external MAVlink comms.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_SBP_BRIDGE
entry.deprecated: Obsolete; the value will be reclaimed in the future.
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_inject_uartd' module, which links between the mission computer and the RTK GPS.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UART_PAYCTL
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_uart' module, which links between the mission computer and the payload controller.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UART_RADCTL
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_uart' module, which links between mission computer and the airside radio controller.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UART_GCS
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_uart' module, which links between mission computer and the GCS controller.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UART_FC
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_uart' module, which links between mission computer and the flight controller.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UART_RTX
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_uart' module, which links between mission computer and the RC transciever.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UDPD_MAVROS
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_udpd' module, linking been internal LCM and MAVROS. Note the cID is set by command line parameter, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UDPD_MAVPROXY
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_udpd' module, linking between external LCM and MAVPROXY. Note the cID is set by command line parameter, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UDPD_DRONEKIT
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_udpd' module, linking between external LCM and DroneKit. Note the cID is set by command line parameter, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UDPD_DFLOGGER
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_udpd' module, linking between internal LCM and dataflash_logger. Note the cID is set by command line parameter, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UDPD_ROCOS
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_udpd' module, linking between internal LCM and ROCOS. Note the cID is set by command line parameter, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UDPD_ETHPAYLOAD
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_udpd' module, linking between internal LCM and custom ethernet payload. Note the cID is set by command line parameter, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UDPD_CD
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_udpd' module, linking between external LCM and a primary endpoint on the ground. Note the cID is set by command line parameter, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UDPD_TELEM
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_udpd' module, linking between external LCM and a secondary endpoint on the ground. Note the cID is set by command line parameter, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_MONITOR_MICROHD
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'microhard_monitord' module, which queries both local and remote pDDL radios. Note the cID is set by command line parameter, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_MONITOR_UAVCAN
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'can_monitord' module, which monitors UAVCAN traffic. Note the cID is set by command line parameter, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_UART_RADCTL_MICROHARD
entry.description: cID for the Mission Computer 'bridge_uart' module, which links between mission computer and the microhard onboard the airside radio controller.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_MAVROS
entry.description: cID for MAVROS itself (not the bridge). Note that mavros.launch hard codes 49, so this definition is just for convenience.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_RTK_GPS
entry.description: cID for an RTK GPS unit.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_PAYCTL
entry.description: cID for the Advanced Payload Controller.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_ASRB
entry.description: cID for the Airside Router Board

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_GSCB
entry.description: cID for the Ground Side Comms Board

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_GSIB
entry.description: cID for the Ground Side Interface Board

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_ASPB
entry.description: cID for the Ground Side Interface Board

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_CBR
entry.description: cID for the CAN Breaout Board

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_DATAFLASHLOGGER
entry.description: cID for the Dataflash Logger on the Mission Computer. This is outside the usual 25-49 range, but left because it's third party software and this is its default.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_SBUS_DECODE
entry.description: cID for the SBUS decoder on the Mission Computer.

entry.name: MAV_COMP_ID_IPDB
entry.description: cID for the ICON power distribution board.

entry.name: ANV_GS_CONTROLLER
entry.description: Premium Ground Station controls

entry.name: ANV_HAND_CONTROLLER_AIRCRAFT
entry.description: Hand controller for aircraft controls

entry.name: ANV_HAND_CONTROLLER_PAYLOAD
entry.description: Hand controller for payload controls

entry.name: ANV_SPRAY_ERROR_FLOWRATE1
entry.description: Nozzle 1 has a flow rate error

entry.name: ANV_SPRAY_ERROR_FLOWRATE2
entry.description: Nozzle 2 has a flow rate error

entry.name: ANV_SPRAY_ERROR_FLOWRATE3
entry.description: Nozzle 3 has a flow rate error

entry.name: ANV_SPRAY_ERROR_FLOWRATE4
entry.description: Nozzle 4 has a flow rate error

entry.name: ANV_SPRAY_ERROR_LOW_PRESSURE
entry.description: Low pressure detected in spray system

entry.name: ANV_SPRAY_ERROR_OVER_PRESSURE
entry.description: Over pressure detected in spray system

entry.name: ANV_SPRAY_ERROR_NO_SPRAY
entry.description: No spray remaining or error with the spray measurement system

message.name: ANV_MSG_REGULATOR_STATUS
message.description: A command for outputing a regulator's status. This includes it's output voltage, current and temperature.
message.field: Voltage output of the regulator measured in mV
Current output of the regulator measured in mA
Temerature of the regulator measured in milli Degrees Celsius
The rated current of the regulator measured in mA
The integral of used power of the regulator. Measured in mAH

message.name: ANV_MSG_BUFFER_STATUS
message.description: A message for viewing a buffers status
message.field: Temerature of the regulator measured in milli Degrees Celsius
The rated current of the regulator measured in mA

message.name: ANV_MSG_GSIB_DATA
message.description: A message for transmitting the data from the UI baord.
message.field: Bit mask of the Digital Switches' state

message.name: ANV_MSG_SBUS_DATA
message.description: A message for passing around a raw sbus frame.

message.name: ANV_MSG_RADIO_DATA
message.description: A message for passing around control frames. This is very similar to ID 5003, but is intended to be sent to the airside receiver. This seperates the reception of sbus data and the transmition
message.field: System time of when the message was sent

message.name: ANV_MSG_FIRMWARE_INFORMATION
message.description: A message for relaying currently running software verions

message.name: ANV_MSG_GSCB_DATA
message.description: A message for transmitting the data from the UI baord.
message.field: 1 if the battery is enabled, 0 otherwise
1 if the battery is enabled, 0 otherwise
1 if the external power is enabled, 0 otherwise
1 if the tray fan is enabled, 0 otherwise
1 if the electronics fan is enabled, 0 otherwise

message.name: ANV_MSG_LATENCY_REPORT
message.description: A response to a specific target of a ping. This lets the target know the latency of the ping it responded to This enables a remote box to update a delta clock for a the remote system to within approximately latency/2 If the latency is too high, the remote can determine what to do with it.
message.field: The latency recorded by the host ping
The sequence ID of the ping request

message.name: ANV_MSG_SMART_PORT_POLL_PACKET
message.description: A message for passing around a smart port poll packet.

message.name: ANV_MSG_GS_CTRL_DATA
message.description: A message for transmitting the data from the UI baord.
message.field: Bit mask of the Digital Switches' state

message.name: ANV_MSG_GSMC_DATA
message.description: A message for transmitting the data from the ground station mission computer.

message.name: ANV_MSG_SYSID
message.description: A message for getting and setting sysids between ACs and GCSs
